Installation
============

Requirements
------------

* Python >= 3.12
* SQLAlchemy >= 2.0.0
* pandas >= 2.0.0
* openpyxl >= 3.1.0
* plotly >= 5.0.0
* kaleido >= 0.2.0

Using pip
---------

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install geomet-screen

Using uv
--------

.. code-block:: bash

   uv pip install geomet-screen

Development Installation
------------------------

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/elphick-consulting/geomet-screen.git
   cd geomet-screen
   pip install -e ".[dev,docs]"
